description: RAVPower®-Reliable · Affordable · ValueAs  the leader in Portable Power Solutions, RAVPower strives to offer every  customer with the most reliable power products, affordable prices, and  the services that you value from a trusted brand. That is the RAVPower  Promise!Compatible model:- Apple:iPhone 5/iPhone 4S, iPhone 4/ The New iPad iPad 4 2- HTC:T-mobile Sensation 4G/ Sensation XE/XL /Amaze 4G/Radar 4G/ EVO 4G/Inspire 4G/ Vivid 4G-  Samsung: Galaxy S4 I9500, Galaxy S 3 i9300, Galaxy S II i9100/Epic 4G  touch/Galaxy Nexus Prime/Galaxy note/Focus S/Samsung Infuse- LG:Nexus 4/Vortex/Revolution/Optimus V/S/T/2x- Amazon: Kindle Fire/Kindle Touch- Others:Blackberry Bold 9900/Sony Ericsson Xperia Arc S/Nokia N9 /lumia800 /3G/4G mobile WIFI hotpot/PSP/MP3/MP4/MP5Specifications:- Capacity; 5600 mAh- Input: DC 5V / 1A;- Output: DC 5V / 1A;- Size: 3.86" x 1.61" x 0.83"- Weight: 4.36 oz.Package Includes:- 1 * RAVPower Power Bank (model: RP-PB03)- 1 * USB Charging cable- 1 * Free Bonus Flannel Bag- 1 * User GuideNotice:Please  be advised that there’s a transparent protective film on the top of our  RP-PB03 Power Bank. You can simply peel it off so as to get rid of the  scratches.
title: RAVPower Element 5600mAh External Battery Pack Portable Charger Power Bank for iPhone 5S, 5C, 5, 4S, 4, iPad Air, 4, 3, 2, Mini 2 (Apple adapters not included); Samsung Galaxy S4, S3, S2, Note 3, Note 2; HTC One, EVO, Thunderbolt, Incredible, Droid DNA, Motorola ATRIX, Droid, Moto X, Google Glass, Nexus 4, Nexus 5, Nexus 7, Nexus 10, LG Optimus, PS Vita, GoPro and More
